title: Ticket #2566: race condition in condor_history
description:
condor_history may skip over some jobs if rotation of the history file happens between the time condor_history builds a list of the history filenames and the time it opens "history". The problem is that "history" may get renamed in the interim.

Igor suspects he encountered a case where condor_history skipped over a bunch of jobs. The above race condition may explain it, but we are not sure it is what really happened.

How to fix: do not rename the main history file. When it is initially created, name it "history.<timestamp>", like the names of the rotated history files. Then "rotation" just means we delete one history file and open a new history file, but no files get renamed.
